name: panomap
description:
panomap is an interactive geography game designed to be played alongside your Twitch chat! Immerse yourself in a thrilling adventure as you explore new destinations around the world, all while engaging with your viewers. As the streamer, you take on the role of the brave explorer, and it's up to everyone, including yourself, to guess your current location by typing their guesses in the chat.

In each round, the game puts you to a random spot on the globe. Together, you and your audience must carefully observe the surroundings and gather clues to deduce your whereabouts. Once someone has a hunch, they can share their guess in the chat. Points are awarded to those who correctly guess your location, based on how quickly they respond. At the end, the player with the highest score wins!

panomap is the perfect game to let your viewers brag about their remarkable geography knowledge and challenge one another. Have an interactive fun with your chat while testing your amazing geography skills.

Please note that you need to have a Twitch account to play the game.
